title: Enhancing Science Education Design Capabilities through Virtual Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Online Learning Tool Proficiency and Secondary-Level Scientific Knowledge
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments, featuring collaborative learning activities reflecting real-world contexts for practicing professionals

learning_goals: Learners can develop science education problem-solving scenarios utilizing narrative inquiry methods
Learners can complete practical tasks with peers and instructors by applying situated learning principles in virtual collaborative environments
Learners can enhance science education design expertise and build professional portfolios through digital community activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
